channel.title: Transferring Money
channel.description: I haven't played RS for months, and I've noticed a lot of updates have centralized around preventing real world traders from trading. I want to put money from an old pure, on to my new main, and was wondering if there's a 'safe way' to do this?

item.title: Transferring Money
item.dc:creator: @xxlegitxx xxlegitxx
item.description:
@xxlegitxx wrote:

Mr.Chris:

I just did the trade, using a friend. I’m wondering how long it would take Jagex to take any action if I was caught?

Weeks to months.

Read full topic

item.title: Transferring Money
item.dc:creator: @Phree_xp Phree xp
item.description:
@Phree_xp wrote:

Me and a freind have been doing the 'Have two accounts in the same place give him the items, then wait a few mins, and get on my pure, and get the stuff, done this for a year or two, and yet to get anything for it.

Read full topic

item.title: Transferring Money
item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy
item.description:
@Dizzy wrote:

Multi-logging is a method I use sometimes, but really, risking an account that you’ve already spent money on, it just wouldn’t be worth it.

So, multi-log trading should be only used for accounts you just started up, to give them a boost. Then later you can start using other methods like drop trading and using a friend.

Read full topic

item.title: Transferring Money
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

just trade it. the worst that will happen is that you get banned then you can just bs an excuse and have your account back in like 30 minutes.

Read full topic

item.title: Transferring Money
item.dc:creator: @pk4pk pk4pk
item.description:
@pk4pk wrote:

Normally I just call my cousin and he hates runescape. He has a level 21 account, so I make it seem like I don’t know him at first. Because we have different Ip’s I would tell him where to meet me by phone and give him like a rune chain and my 3mil lets say,“Here you go noob this is nub stuff” then I would tell him to log out for 10min then in again then I’d go on my pure and id give him like 50laws and a iron chain for the 3mil. They can flag you but it’s very hard because he then would say something like “runescape is boring here this guy gave me this stuff you can have it.” Then I’d except and it’s all good. The only thing they have is the two same Ip’s you were on. But then jagex could think, “maybe that level 21 didn’t know it was the same guy so…” Something like that.

Another way would be if somehow you had two computers with different Ip’s…just multi log and they have nothing on you. Two diffrent Ip’s two different users. Trade/Accept/Accept.

Read full topic

item.title: Transferring Money
item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy
item.description:
@Dizzy wrote:

BUZZ!! Wrong! They actually CAN trace you if you do that. Their tracing systems are much more advance than you think. One reason why I say this is because my friend and I have tested many methods of item transfer and dying in the wilderness was one thing we actually got caught for.

Read full topic

item.title: Transferring Money
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

just die in the wild there is no way in hell jagex can trace that to you.

Read full topic

item.title: Transferring Money
item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy
item.description:
@Dizzy wrote:

That’s a pretty good idea. I just might try that out next time I transfer.

Read full topic

item.title: Transferring Money
item.dc:creator: @bobby Bobby
item.description:
@bobby wrote:

I also have a pure with a mill or two and I think that when i want to trade the money, ill just buy iron ore or something at a low price and then for a really bad price to ma y main. my pure will still have a little money though. but its pretty safe that way.

Read full topic

item.title: Transferring Money
item.dc:creator: @Mr.Chris Mr.Chris
item.description:
@Mr.Chris wrote:

I plan trade a small amount of 1.1M. I don’t really have anyone I can trust with this, if I’m honest. I’ll see what I have on my mains back (once the pin cancels) to see if i can balance out the trade.

Read full topic

item.title: Transferring Money
item.dc:creator: @Dizzy Dizzy
item.description:
@Dizzy wrote:

My friend and I transfer items all the time. So far it has seemed safe, but we also do take precautions. Usually if I would transfer, say, a fury over to my defence pure, I would give him the fury and he would give me a Rune item (chainbody, med/full helm, etc.). Then when I get on my other account, I would just give him my junk that I don’t need anymore. The thing that counts is that the first trade wasn’t as imbalanced as the second; therefor they don’t suspect AS MUCH, but you would still most likey be flagged down.

When transfering items, be sure to set a limit, because the more you trade over the higher the chance of being caught. And after every trade you do, wait atleast 4 days to 1 week before doing it again.

Read full topic

item.title: Transferring Money
item.dc:creator: @billygotshot billygotshot
item.description:
@billygotshot wrote:

[quote=“xxlegitxx, post:9, topic:163316”][quote author=billygotshot link=topic=221952.msg1920163#msg1920163 date=1197155597]
just trade uneven ammounts…

like how much do you want to transfer? if its like 10m just trade 10m for like full steel or something…
[/quote]

If you were Jagex, and you noticed someone trading 10m for something worth 5k, what would you be thinking?[/quote]

they would be thinking someone is loaning them money… i have made alot of trades in similar ways… just go get pked in the wild… take one character with the money go into the wild with 10m then get your main to kill him…

Read full topic

item.title: Transferring Money
item.dc:creator: @gothic_queen casey.
item.description:
@gothic_queen wrote:

The methods I normally use:

Log in on two accounts, and put up my items{usually transferring my santa+cash}. Then add 100 gp to the other account.
Now it looks like a legit trade, item for item.

Or I will drop trade.
In a empty area, so as deep in the lumby swamp.

Read full topic

item.title: Transferring Money
item.dc:creator: @Chimaera_God Chimaera God
item.description:
@Chimaera_God wrote:

Just log on to both accounts at the same time. Use the unsigned Java applet trick thing. I use it all the time to transfer stuff between my acounts.

Read full topic

item.title: Transferring Money
item.dc:creator: @I_Br3ndan_I I Br3ndan I
item.description:
@I_Br3ndan_I wrote:

Give it to someone you trust that can hold it for you, or drop trade it. Drop trading isn’t allowed, and I believe you can be banned for it. Also, there’s a risk of other players taking your stuff whilst you’re waiting on it.

Those are the only options I’m afraid. Unless you can somehow use two clients at the same time and travel one account to the other, then trade from there.

Read full topic
